name: Fly Trap: a hyper-short text based adventure
name_original: Fly Trap: a hyper-short text based adventure
description:
Fly trap is a short text-based adventure written in twine. you can play it online here on itch.io or poke at the source code at https://github.com/wbalmer/fly_trap.

This project is largely a personal test, practicing using Twine, git, github, my own website, and now itch.io, and is licensed under the GNU public license. I'm intending to expand on the work later, so your thoughts are much appreciated.

~~william
